TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Export extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an export, which is a type that consists of a delay-created exported object and the metadata that describes that object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Derived types that call this constructor must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Definition%2A> property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.GetExportedValueCore%2A> method.

Docs.param: An object that describes the contract that the object satisfies.
A method that is called to create the exported object of the . This delays the creation of the object until the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Value%2A> property is called.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified export definition and exported object getter.

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata for the export.
